meta_description: "Upgrade your kitchen with our 33.5in. x 19in. sink, featuring a 9.5in. basin depth and 1 basin rack included. Made with durable granite, quartz, and stone composite, this modern sink is perfect for any commercial use. Limited lifetime warranty included. Shop now!"
meta_title: "Cairn 33-1/2" Undermount Single Bowl Neoroc Granite Sink | Bottom Rack"

t3.material: Granite Composite, Quartz Composite, Stone Composite

details:
{
    'p1': 'The Cairn sink offers a transitional style with soft French curves that can suit both contemporary and traditional kitchens. Made of Kohler Neoroc, a durable and beautiful matte-finish composite material, the Cairn sink is richly colored to complement any countertop. It is resistant to scratches, stains, fading, and is highly heat- and impact-resistant. This sink also comes with a bottom sink rack to maintain its new appearance.',
    'p2': 'Kohler K-8206 Features:',
    'strong1': 'Kohler K-8206 Features:',
    'ul1': "Covered under Kohler's limited lifetime warranty36-in minimum cabinet base widthIncludes basin rackNeoroc is scratch, stain, chip, and thermal-shock resistantNo faucet holesOffset drain increases workspace in the sink and storage space underneathIncludes K-5196 bottom sink rackIncludes cutout templates and installation clips",
    'li1': "Covered under Kohler's limited lifetime warranty",
    'li2': '36-in minimum cabinet base width',
    'li3': 'Includes basin rack',
    'li4': 'Neoroc is scratch, stain, chip, and thermal-shock resistant',
    'li5': 'No faucet holes',
    'li6': 'Offset drain increases workspace in the sink and storage space underneath',
    'li7': 'Includes K-5196 bottom sink rack',
    'li8': 'Includes cutout templates and installation clips',
    'p3': 'Kohler K-8206 Specifications:',
    'strong2': 'Kohler K-8206 Specifications:',
    'ul2': 'Sink Length: 33-1/2” (from left to right)Sink Width: 18-5/16” (from front to back)Sink Height: 10-1/8” (from bottom to top)Basin Dimensions: 30-9/16" L x 15-3/8” W x 9-1/2” DMinimum Cabinet Size: 36”Drain Connection: 3-7/8"',
